title: Evolving Boid Flocks
desc: Two seperate teams of boids fight each other by dealing damange when in range and facing an enemy. Each battle, the best boid of each team parents the next generation.

title: Spores of Corruption
desc: A submission to the Extra Credits Game Jam #6. Use your drone to safely separate infected citizens and cure them of corruption, and detonate spores a safe distance away from the uninfected.

title: Staying Dry in the Thunderstorm
desc: Made for the Rain Jam 2020. Keep your dog dry with your umbrella and dodge lightning strikes for as long as you can by calling your dog to heel when they are in danger.
